'SNV Netherlands Development Organisation' is a non-profit, international
development organisation, established in the Netherlands in 1965.

SNV aims to alleviate poverty by enabling increased income and employment
opportunities and increasing access to basic services. The organisation
currently works in 36 countries in Africa, Asia, and Latin America. Official Website: http://www.snvworld.org
categories: Non-profit organisations based in the Netherlands
